about_the_game:
The game combines high-octane real-time combat with tower-climbing exploration and quest-solving elements. Players ascend the Tower of Desolation, battling enemies, upgrading weapons. Save your dying brother from a mysterious sickness. Climb the tower to find the ultimate cure.

Explore

Delve deep into an interconnected world with alternate paths and secret loot. Bring hope to the inhabitants of the Tower as you search for the ultimate cure.

Fight

Unleash destruction through harnessing the power of lightning. Discover new ways to dismantle your enemies as you gain shock-based abilities. Switch between melee and ranged attacks against a fantastic array of mechanized demigods.

Upgrade

Upgrade weapons, discover new combat skills, and customize a loadout to your playstyle.

Unlock

Uncover the Tower's true purpose as you traverse it's ominous labyrinth. Climb higher to unfold the truth of humanity's common task.

name: Shadow of Mammon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U (4 * 1800) or equivalent; AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 ( 2048 MB); Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent; AMD FX-8350 (8 * 4700) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 ( 2048 MB); Radeon RX 580 (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: In a land they were never meant to enter. A sibling's desperate quest to save her brother will uncover a secret meant to stay buried. Shadow of Mammon is a heart-pounding third-person action RPG shooter delivering intense combat in a captivating narrative.
